author: hufnagel
body:
Updates t0wmadatasvc to 1.0.2, the only change is to return an additional field in a REST API call which was already in the database but was mistakenly left out in the retrieval.

New version built in private repo and deployed on private cmsweb VM, work there.

Hope it can still make it into the Wednesday deployment.
title: upgrade t0wmadatasvc to 1.0.2
